entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kitimat Forest Ave 6:00 PM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and rain showers. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow with a few rain showers in the evening and with rain at times heavy late in the evening and overnight. Snowfall amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023
